dotnetType.name: StringDeserializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.StringSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new string deserializer builder case.

returns.summary: A function that accepts a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and returns a deserialized object.

overloads.summary: Builds a string deserializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated deserializers should use for read operations.

returns.summary: Whether the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.StringSchema" />.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a schema.

returns.summary: Always true; this case will apply but fail if no conversion exists from <see cref="T:System.String" />.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a type resolution.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StringDeserializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
